item.title: Walt Disney World 2026: All New Attractions, Festivals, and Events in ...
item.description: Free Disney Water Park admission on arrival day returns for Disney Resort hotel guests. Disney H2O Glow After Hours returns to Typhoon Lagoon. Banana Ball at ESPN Wide World of Sports: May 29-30. Bluey and Bingo meet-and-play experience opens at Conservation Station in Disney's Animal Kingdom.

item.title: NEWS HUB - Walt Disney World Ride Wait Times – Morning, Afternoon ...
item.description: Stay up to date with the latest wait times across Walt Disney World. This thread will be updated five times daily with reports on wait times from park open.. 10 am Update: Wait times from park open to 10am 1 pm Update: Wait times from 10am to 1pm 5 pm Update: Wait times from 1pm to 5pm 10 pm...

item.title: News - ABC's 2025 Disney Parks Holiday Specials at Walt Disney World
item.description: Disney’s Emmy Award-winning annual celebration returns Christmas morning with magical star-studded performances from Walt Disney World Resort in Florida; Disneyland Resort in California and Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa in Ko Olina, Hawaiʻi.

item.title: Mirror Walt Disney World 3.0 – The Definitive Version
item.description: Mirror Walt Disney World 3.0 The Definitive Version Last year, I started a project that I think is the favorite of all the projects I’ve done across ten years of being part of the online Armchair Imagineering community: Mirror Walt Disney World.
